magpie.data.utilities.splitters

Class MixedMetalsSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.BaseDatasetSplitter
      • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.AllMetalsSplitter
        • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.MixedMetalsSplitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable

    public class MixedMetalsSplitter
extends AllMetalsSplitter
    This class splits a CompositionDataset into three subsets: all metals (0), no metals (1), mixture (2)

    Usage: *No options to set*

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
